alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Carbon, northeastern Albany, northwestern Laramie, Platte and southern Converse Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 435 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Sinclair to 13 miles southeast of Garrett. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bordeaux around 515 PM MDT. Slater around 520 PM MDT. Chugwater and Elk Mountain around 530 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 50 and 145. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 215 and 276. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
